type.en: Course with defence at the end

description.en: Composing and defending a dissertation according to Thesis Guidelines
description.et: Lõputöö koostamine vastavalt juhendile ja kaitsmine

objectives.en: The purpose of composing and defending a dissertation is to fortify and elaborate on the general and special knowledge acquired by the student throughout the curriculum, and to develop the skills of practical research and presentation.
objectives.et: Lõputöö koostamise ning kaitsmisega taotletakse, et õppija kinnistab ja süvendab õppekava läbimisel omandatud üld- ja erialaseid teadmisi ning arendab praktiliseks uurimistööks ja esitluseks vajalikke oskusi.

assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)
